UK Postcodes and NUTS3 Codes

Source: R/avail-ons.R
pc.Rd

UK Postcodes and NUTS3 Codes

pc

Format

An object of class spec_tbl_df (inherits from tbl_df, tbl, data.frame) with 1759911 rows and 2 columns.

Examples

pc
#> # A tibble: 1,759,911 x 2
#>    NUTS3 CODE    
#>    <chr> <chr>   
#>  1 UKM73 EH10 7DP
#>  2 UKM73 EH10 7DX
#>  3 UKM73 EH10 7DY
#>  4 UKM73 EH10 7DZ
#>  5 UKM73 EH10 7EA
#>  6 UKM73 EH10 7EB
#>  7 UKM73 EH10 7GZ
#>  8 UKM73 EH17 8SA
#>  9 UKM73 EH17 8SB
#> 10 UKM73 EH18 1AA
#> # ... with 1,759,901 more rows
